title: Monitor freezes randomly only on league fullscreen
body: I am using a monitor for all my games now, but only on league of legends in fullscreen my monitor just randomly freezes. In windowed mode it never happens and any other game. fix this

replies.body: Did you recently update Windows 10?  There's been an issue where the Xbox game bar has been causing a freeze for some players.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up.  I hope that helps!
